message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Cautious tone with more red closes across the screen. IT and discretionary remained weak (COFORGE, PERSISTENT, TRENT), while autos/selected financials showed relative strength (AUBANK, SBICARD, JUBLFOOD, MUTHOOTFIN). Metals were mixed but copper names held better (HINDCOPPER steady; SAIL mild pullback). Renewables softened (SUZLON closed near lows). Exchanges eased but BSE defended the 2060 zone on heavy volume. No trades today; we’ll firm up levels over the weekend.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "ASHOKLEY", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Strong volume; defended intraday dip and held >142. A sustained push above 144.5 could trigger momentum.", "price": 142.26},
    {"symbol": "HINDCOPPER", "signal": "Momentum long watch", "reason": "Metals resilience; needs continuation above 314 to confirm break; higher-low structure intact.", "price": 308.71},
    {"symbol": "JUBLFOOD", "signal": "Reversal long watch", "reason": "Closed near day high after testing 611; follow-through above 632 can extend bounce.", "price": 630.4},
    {"symbol": "SBICARD", "signal": "Bullish continuation", "reason": "Green close with strong intraday recovery; watch 888–890 breakout zone.", "price": 884.75},
    {"symbol": "BSE", "signal": "Buy-the-dip watch", "reason": "Heavy volume defense of 2060; base-building above 2085–2090 would turn constructive.", "price": 2076.4},
    {"symbol": "POLICYBZR", "signal": "Hammer reversal watch", "reason": "Big intraday rebound from 1681 low; confirmation needed above ~1750.", "price": 1735.2},
    {"symbol": "PIDILITIND", "signal": "Bullish reversal", "reason": "Reclaimed 1500 after undercut to 1475; strength above 1520–1522 can negate prior breakdown risk.", "price": 1519.5},
    {"symbol": "DEEPAKNTR", "signal": "Breakout attempt", "reason": "Closed strong; follow-through above 1875–1905 with volume would validate a breakout.", "price": 1869.4},
    {"symbol": "KAYNES", "signal": "Relative strength", "reason": "Closed strong despite broader softness; watch 7527 high for continuation (note: high ticket size).", "price": 7454.0},
    {"symbol": "GRSE", "signal": "Momentum continuation", "reason": "Trend intact; a clean move through 2745 can open higher levels.", "price": 2714.8},
    {"symbol": "CREDITACC", "signal": "Momentum long watch", "reason": "Closed near day high; follow-through above 1398 keeps momentum live.", "price": 1391.2},
    {"symbol": "MCX", "signal": "Hold/reclaim watch", "reason": "Lost 8000 on close after intraday strength; need reclaim >8000–8050 to stay constructive.", "price": 7955.5},
    {"symbol": "SUZLON", "signal": "Wait-and-watch", "reason": "Closed near lows; bulls need a reclaim of 58.8/60 or hold of 57.3 support.", "price": 57.5},
    {"symbol": "SAIL", "signal": "Pullback buy watch", "reason": "Held 136 after hitting 138.8; a move back above 139 could resume momentum.", "price": 136.34},
    {"symbol": "AUBANK", "signal": "Bullish continuation", "reason": "Green close; watch for breakout above 743–745 to extend uptrend.", "price": 736.15},
    {"symbol": "JINDALSTEL", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Pullback but structure intact; a push through 1069–1070 remains key.", "price": 1052.65},
    {"symbol": "ESCORTS", "signal": "Level-based watch", "reason": "Faded from highs; strength only above 3748/3765. Below, expect chop.", "price": 3698.9}
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 25000.0,
    "total_value": 25000.0,
    "holdings_count": 0,
    "holdings": []
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "Sector tone: IT and consumer discretionary weak (COFORGE, PERSISTENT, TRENT); selective strength in autos/financials (ASHOKLEY, AUBANK, SBICARD, MUTHOOTFIN). Metals mixed with copper names relatively firm (HINDCOPPER, SAIL). Renewables soft (SUZLON), exchanges eased (BSE, CDSL).",
    "Key Monday triggers: ASHOKLEY > 144.5; HINDCOPPER > 314; JINDALSTEL > 1070; AUBANK > 743–745; SBICARD > 890; JUBLFOOD > 632; DEEPAKNTR > 1905; GRSE > 2745; MCX reclaim > 8000; BSE base > 2085–2090; SUZLON hold 57.3 or reclaim 59–60; TRENT needs > 4925 to repair.",
    "Liquidity fit for ₹25k: prioritize 1–2 liquid names sub-₹1,000 (ASHOKLEY, SAIL, HINDCOPPER, JUBLFOOD, SBICARD [smaller size], AUBANK). Avoid high-ticket entries (KAYNES, MCX, AMBER) for now.",
    "Risk plan for next week: cap risk per trade to ~1% of portfolio (~₹250); place stops ~2–3% below entry; avoid chasing gap-ups—prefer breakout-and-retest or pullback near support with confirmation and volume.",
    "Weak/avoid list until strength returns: COFORGE, MPHASIS, PERSISTENT (IT), TRENT (retail), INOXWIND (weak close at support), OBEROIRLTY (realty softness).",
    "Volume cues: Elevated turnover in IDEA, ASHOKLEY, SUZLON; BSE/CDSL active with profit-taking—watch for stabilization near supports.",
    "Tactical: If triggers gap above levels on Monday, wait 15–30 minutes for retest before acting; if prices open at support, require reversal candles + improving volume.",
    "No trades executed today; weekend focus on refining levels, alerts, and position sizing for a 1–2 position start."
  ]
}
